mapper.select: SELECT A.AL_ID, A.AL_NAME, A.AL_AGE, A.AL_ZIP, A.AL_ADD1, A.AL_ADD2, A.AL_HP, A.AL_GEN, A.AL_MAIL, A.AL_CAREER, A.AL_SPEC, A.AL_DESC, A.AL_IMG, G.GR_CODE, G.GR_NAME, L.LIC_CODE, L.LIC_NAME, LA.LIC_IMG, LA.LIC_DATE FROM ALBA A JOIN GRADE G ON A.GR_CODE = G.GR_CODE LEFT JOIN LIC_ALBA LA ON A.AL_ID = LA.AL_ID LEFT JOIN LICENSE L ON LA.LIC_CODE = L.LIC_CODE

SELECT A.AL_ID, A.AL_NAME, A.AL_AGE, A.AL_ZIP, A.AL_ADD1, A.AL_ADD2, A.AL_HP, A.AL_GEN, A.AL_MAIL, A.AL_CAREER, A.AL_SPEC, A.AL_DESC, A.AL_IMG, G.GR_CODE, G.GR_NAME, L.LIC_CODE, L.LIC_NAME, LA.LIC_IMG, LA.LIC_DATE FROM ALBA A JOIN GRADE G ON A.GR_CODE = G.GR_CODE LEFT JOIN LIC_ALBA LA ON A.AL_ID = LA.AL_ID LEFT JOIN LICENSE L ON LA.LIC_CODE = L.LIC_CODE WHERE A.AL_ID = #{alId}

SELECT A.AL_ID, A.AL_NAME, A.AL_AGE, A.AL_ZIP, A.AL_ADD1, A.AL_ADD2, A.AL_HP, A.AL_GEN, A.AL_MAIL, A.AL_CAREER, A.AL_SPEC, A.AL_DESC, A.AL_IMG, G.GR_CODE, G.GR_NAME, L.LIC_CODE, L.LIC_NAME, LA.LIC_IMG, LA.LIC_DATE FROM ALBA A JOIN GRADE G ON A.GR_CODE = G.GR_CODE LEFT JOIN LIC_ALBA LA ON A.AL_ID = LA.AL_ID LEFT JOIN LICENSE L ON LA.LIC_CODE = L.LIC_CODE
AND A.GR_CODE = #{grCode}
AND A.AL_GEN LIKE '%' || #{alGen} || '%'
AND A.AL_GEN = #{alGen}
AND A.AL_ADDR1 LIKE '%' || #{alAddr1} || '%'
AND A.AL_CAREER LIKE '%' || #{alCareer} || '%'
AND A.AL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{alName} || '%'
ORDER BY A.AL_ID ASC
